classic light.name: Classic Light
classic light.description: The original, clean, and easy-to-read look.

classic dark.name: Classic Dark
classic dark.description: For those who prefer to solve puzzles in the dark.

oceanic.name: Oceanic
oceanic.description: A calming palette of deep sea blue and sandy orange.

forest floor.name: Forest Floor
forest floor.description: Earthy tones of rich soil, fallen leaves, and vibrant moss.

rose petal.name: Rose Petal
rose petal.description: A soft and vibrant theme inspired by a summer garden.

high contrast.name: High Contrast
high contrast.description: A bright and accessible palette designed for clarity.

royal decree.name: Royal Decree
royal decree.description: A regal combination of deep purple and shimmering gold.

sakura.name: Sakura
sakura.description: Gentle colors inspired by cherry blossoms in the spring.

synthwave sunset.name: Synthwave Sunset
synthwave sunset.description: A retro 80s dream of neon magenta and cyan.

molten core.name: Molten Core
molten core.description: Fiery colors forged in the heart of a volcano.

bio-luminescent.name: Bio-Luminescent
bio-luminescent.description: Glowing colors from the mysterious depths of the ocean.

gold & onyx.name: Gold & Onyx
gold & onyx.description: The ultimate in luxury, crafted from pure gold and onyx.

holographic.name: Holographic
holographic.description: A shifting, futuristic palette that glimmers in the light.

celestial.name: Celestial
celestial.description: Cosmic colors drawn from distant stars and nebulae.

aetherium.name: Aetherium
aetherium.description: An ethereal theme of pure magic and crystalline light.
